name: Paranormal Files: Hook Man's Legend
storyline: Rick Rogers is summoned to town of Ashen Valley by a mysterious girl in the middle of the night - this town can be found only on an old map. This time the fate of the whole town lies in Rick's hands. But the case turns out to be more complicated than it seems. Mass disappearances and the legend of a maniac, the Hook Man, keep the town in fear. Who is the Hook Man and why the ghosts are terrorizing the small town?
